entry.title: Xamarin Link Roundup – 11 May 2016
entry.content:
More fantastic links from around the community!

Xamarin.Forms

  • Jason Smith’s Xamarin Forms Performance Tips – Jason Smith’s Xamarin Forms Performance Tips
  • Scaffolding Xamarin.Forms Pages with DataPages | Xamarin Blog – An introduction to Xamarin.Forms data pages on the Xamarin Blog
  • Xamarin Evolve 2016 App Development Retrospective – @JamesMontemagno shares the highs, lows and lessons learnt creating the #XamarinEvolve app.
  • Xamarin.Forms XAML Previewer Design Time Data – @JamesMontemagno shows how to integrate design time data into the new XAML Previewer!
  • A very small pub/sub solution for Xamarin Forms – A very small pub/sub solution for Xamarin Forms
  • Xamarin Forms Deep Linking and App Indexing with AppLinks – App indexing and deep linking in the Xamarin world

iOS

  • Detailed Look At Whats New in Xamarin.iOS for Visual Studio – Adam Pedley gives the rundown of what’s new for Xamarin.iOS for Visual Studio
  • Tools – iOSStack – IOSStack lists out some cool tools to make your Mobile development life easier.

Android

  • Using Google Place Picker For Android – Ruben Macias shows how to use the PlacePicker from the Google Places API in Xamarin.Android.

Components and Tools

  • Introducing Realm Xamarin – Realm is a mobile database: a replacement for SQLite & Core Data – Realm mobile database release for Xamarin. Sounds super exciting!
  • NuGet gold nuggets – packages which are in my almost every Xamarin project – Gerald Versluis shares a list of NuGet Nuggets
  • Using iOS and 1Writer as a Presentation Assistant – Greg Shackles shows a cool workflow and a nice tool for presenters
  • Getting Started with VSTS and Xamarin – Richard Woollcott has started a blog series on Mobile DevOps with VSTS / XS / Hockey / Test Cloud
  • Announcing HttpClientDiagnostics – Geoffrey Huntley – HttpClientDiagnostics is a cross platform, portable class library that provides tracing/logging telemetry of Microsoft.Net.HttpClient requests.

Other

  • Snippet Essentials – Because you can never have enough Snippets – Snippet Essentials
  • Azure App Services and Xamarin – Get started with Azure App Services and Xamarin with this tutorial.

Design

  • From Sketch to App: A Design to Development Workflow – David Ortinau continues his #XamarinEvolve discussion on Design to Development workflow.
  • 7 Tips for Creating Engaged, Informed Users – DZone Mobile – 7 tips for creating great mobile app onboarding experiences

Community

  • 10 Developer Takeaways from Xamarin Evolve -Telerik Developer Network – Summary of the key takeaways for developers from #XamarinEvolve

More Xamarin Link Blogs

Here are links to the other great Xamarin link blogs out there that are updated regularly

  • Xamarin Weekly

    A free, once-weekly e-mail newsletter roundup of all things Xamarin. Posted Fridays

  • Xamarin App Developer Links

    The latest tips, tutorials, news, and resources for Xamarin app developers. Posted Daily

  • C# Mobile (Xamarin) Daily

    Your cross-platform C# mobile magazine. Posted Daily

  • Xamarin Community Blogs

    This is an automatic aggregator which pulls articles from bloggers in the Xamarin developer community.

entry.title: Xamarin, iBeacons and Geofencing – Some Resources

link.title: Xamarin, iBeacons and Geofencing – Some Resources

entry.content:
For an upcoming geekend (a weekend hackfest) we are looking at spending some time digging into iBeacon and Geofencing technologies.  I was going to email some of these resources I have found to the participants but thought it might be better if I blog them as a resource for others. 

Hope it helps

Some General Info About Geofencing and Beacons

  • What’s the difference between beacons and geofencing? (video link). 
  • There is also an interesting prezi presentation here, bit sales oriented, but not bad. 
  • If you need even more convincing that location and geofencing are the future then have a read of this old Wired article. 

Geofencing Implementations

  • Xamarin iOS Geofence documentation 
  • Windows Phone 8.1 for Developers – Geolocation and Geofencing 
  • Trigger a Background Task using Geofence on Windows Phone 8.1 
  • Android Geofencing and Geolocation – Xamrin Forum link

Beacons, iBeacons and BLE Implementations

  • James Montemagno’s presentation on iBeacons for Everyone, from iOS to Android 
  • Mike Bluestein blog post (and sample app) – Play ‘Find The Monkey’ with iOS 7 iBeacons 
  • Larry O’Briens blog post on Xamairn Code for iBeacons 
  • iBeacon Generic – A Generic Monotouch.iOS binding for beacons.
  • Very thorough article by Vincent Hoogendoorn – Building Cross-Platform iBeacon Apps for iOS, Android and Windows with C# and Xamarin 
  • Chris Riesgo Android iBeacon Service (Radius Network beacons) 
  • Greg Shackles Estimote iOS Bindings for Xamarin

  • Tom Opgenorth has an Estimote SDK binding for Android in the Xamarin Component store. 
  • Xamarin-EstimoteBeacons on GitHub
